text: Baichung Bhutia (born 15 December 1976) is an former Indian professional footballer. NationalFootballTeams.com, "Bhutia, Baichung"; retrieved 2012-7-19. He played for the India national football team.FIFA.com, "Baichung BHUTIA" ; retrieved 2012-7-19. Bhutia retired from international competition in 2011.Soccerway.com, "Bhutia gets fitting farewell," 15 October 2011; retrieved 2012-7-19. == Career statistics == === Club career statistics === |-
